strings.homeDescription: IFRC GO aims to make all disaster information universally accessible and useful to IFRC responders for better decision making.
strings.keyFiguresDrefDescription: These are small to medium scale emergency operations funded through the Disaster Relief Emergency Fund (DREF).The DREF provides immediate financial support to National Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, enabling them to carry out their unique role as first responders after a disaster.
strings.keyFigureActiveAppealDescription: These are medium to large scale emergency operations funded through a public appeal for funds.
